title: English Reading Instructional Design Workshop for Bilingual Children

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A training program for pre-service teachers to design and implement English reading education scenarios for bilingual children in a virtual environment

learning_goals: Learners will design at least three English reading education strategies reflecting phonological awareness transfer characteristics in bilingual children.
Learners will develop at least one VR-based instructional material for explicit alphabet principle instruction.
Learners will select English texts suitable for repeated reading activities and propose a digitally implementable monitoring system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
